title: Still no word on whether or not OCE will be getting a free skin?
body: I sincerely hope Riot will receive **a lot** of backlash in their decision not to give us **our** server skin for **free**.

replies.body:
Don't like it?

Don't buy it.

There is no reason why you should be such a self entitled moron. I'm just glad we got a server in the first place, it was a risky endeavour for Riot given the size of our playerbase. 

BTW, its a 1350 skin, that is 50% off for people on the OCE server, and 100% of sales are going to charity.
And none of that changes the fact that OCE will end up being the only server to have to pay for their server skin.

that's because a few people got a free skin already (bring on the other 80% of the community who didn't)

that's because a few people got a free skin already (bring on the other 80% of the community who didn't)
(first 2 weeks its 50% off and goes to charity, after that, the money belongs to riot)
I don't know what all the fuss is about, but the main thing i don't understand is how that skin represents OCE. Stars are in every region -_-

The fuss is that after a 2 year wait with the expectation of being free we are now being unfairly told we have to pay for our regional skin while other servers got their regional skin for free, and that their excuse that "well you were already given Pool Party Ziggs so no tough luck" is pathetic that's directly contradicted by some regions receiving other skins in additional to their regional skin such as both Russia and Turkey who were both given 3 skins in total. And their shallow and pathetic use of "charity donations" to try and manipulate the negative reaction makes things even worse.
1350 cosmic kassadin has popped up on the PBE with what riot showed to us in their server skin post

was just stating the skin

So you understand I was referring to why people fussing over why the skin **isn't free**, which is directing referencing the **original focal point** of this thread, which is due to the reasons I listed above. The aesthetic appeal of the skin or opinion of the chosen champion, which are highly debatable subjective things, has **NOTHING** to do with why people are fussing over the skin not being free and thus has no relation to the point I was making.
Why isn't it a skin about tribes or something? Aboriginal tribes, Mauri tribes, Samoan Tribes etc that would make more sense -_- Could have had a tribal Renekton or something.
Southern Cross mate. Viewable only in the southern hemisphere, which is where all of OCE is. No other region in LoL can see that constellation.
Since when was Brazil not in the southern hemisphere?

We wont get the skin for free, they will get raged at on release, 3 weeks after release no one will even remember there was a skin, and they will be a million dollars richer. If you were them would you give that up? i wouldn't give up that much money because it might slightly annoy some people.

anyway 675 is nothing, thats like half a McDonalds meal, so you have the choice to either eat half an unhealthy meal once, or have an awesome skin forever and have the money donated to charity, fair deal to me.
They'd be just as much richer if they gave it to OCE for free.

Not really, because not everyone on the server is going to buy it in the first 2 weeks, which means at some point the rest of the server will purchase it and riot will profit. however if they give it to everyone on the server, there wont be anyone left to buy it until the new generation of oce players trickles through, and so will make far less profit.
Hint: they don't give a shit about the few people who would buy the skin past the first 2 weeks, they get their pay check from the other servers.

theres something like 175,000 ranked players in oce, (forgetting all the people that don't play ranked)
if every single one of them was gifted the skin for free riot would only make money from people who start after the release date.
however if say half of those people buy the skin in the first 2 weeks (hypothetically speaking, we know it will be less than that most likely) that leaves 87,500 people left as potential buyers, the skin is 975 which means a $10 RP purchace is needed so thats a potential $875,000 they would be missing out on if they gave it to us for free, and thats assuming that half the people buy the skin initially which is unliekly and completly forgetting all the people who don't play ranked, so in reality its probably going to be closer to 2 million dollars of potential profit they miss out on. PLUS the people who start after the release date.
Hint: very few companies are not gunna give a shit about 2 million dollars.
Yes because 87500 people would actually buy this piece of shit skin, let alone everyone on our server.
Like i said 'potential' and 'hypothetical'

Yeah and then we come back to realism, where Rito will get tons of backlash from OCE players to the point where they may actually lose money because of this (ie. money that people no longer wish to spend on the game because of this giant turd in our face.)

Personally unless i see a skin this is so amazing i 100% must buy it (and i'll be honest, the one and only time that has happened is warring kingdoms nidalee, that cougar is down right badass.) I'm honestly not going to spend anything on this game, and i was someone who would do a decent amount of transactions.

So just because it's a free to play game we can't "complain" about Riot's decisions? What we can't complain about them treating us unfairly by making us pay for our regional skin after more than a 2 year wait with the expectation it would be free? What we can't complain that other regions were given their regional skin for free while we are being made to pay for ours? What we can't complain that their reasoning that "well you already got Pool Party Ziggs" makes zero sense and is a pathetic cop out that is directly contradicted by other servers having received other free skins in addition to their regional skin, like Russia and Turkey who both got **3 FREE SKINS** in total? And can't we complain about their pathetic and shallow attempt at manipulating negative reactions to this situation through the use of the "charity donations"? I'm sorry but you're an idiot if you think that because it's a free to play game we don't have or shouldn't complain and criticise Riot's decisions.

Its a skin inspired  by the region we live in, why should it be exclusive to us? We get masked shaco, sultan gp/trynd, bear Calvary Sej, arctic Caitlin, Northern Storm voli and the rest of the regionally inspired skins, why shouldn't they be allowed to have ours? Would you rather we were the only one with ours and we missed out on ALL the others or would you rather everyone can use all the skins?

And be realistic about the pbe, our server isn't big enough to have dominion or 3v3 and you want to split it in half by adding a pbe?
why not :)

Are you really this stupid? The regional skins aren't made to be exclusive to that region, rather they are made to **represent** that region. The other regional skins were all released outside of their representative region and ours will be no different, except that we have to pay for our own skin while the others got theirs for free. And the PBE gets our skin because it is the **Public Beta Environment**, you know that place where Riot test all content before pushing it to live servers. And giving us own our PBE, regardless of size, is just a stupid idea and a waste of their resources.

you know, I don't give a donkeys behind about this, I couldn't actually give less of a damn about kassadin, (he isn't yasuo(which should have definitely gotten a nice sleek sexier than ever skin)) I just feel like complaining.

As far as I'm aware the **only** "free" skin given out exclusively on OCE was PP Ziggs (which was supposed to be an apology for Riot taking so long with the server skin), so any evidence that the people of OCE got Tundra Fizz for some reason (or no reason) while other servers missed out would be appreciated. Also, if you can list any other skins that the people of OCE got free then I'd also like that list.

incorrect. PP ziggs was given out to people who transferred over early and participated in the BETA. that's what it was advertised as. it was never meant to be a gift for any other reason or replace our regional skin.

> PP ziggs was given out to people who transferred over early and participated in the BETA.

I'm not saying this isn't correct, but (to the best of my knowledge) part of the reason Riot gave it out for those in the beta was as an apology because there was no server skin at that point.

> it was never meant to be a gift for any other reason or replace our regional skin.

Riot would disagree with that point, claiming PP Ziggs was meant to be the only "free" skin given to OCE (essentially replacing our server skin), but it's complete bull. They're just saying that to try and make people think it's been a long term plan.

Im assuming he means that he got tundra fizz when they gave out the rewards for good behaviour, and it wasnt all the same skin, i got infernal alistar not tundra fizz. But i think it was a worldwide thing not just OCE.
